name: ClassBuilder.MethodBuilder
description:
The `ClassBuilder.MethodBuilder` class is a specialized builder for creating and configuring methods within generated classes. This builder provides a fluent API for defining method signatures, parameters, return types, method bodies, annotations, and visibility modifiers, allowing you to create comprehensive method implementations.

MethodBuilder instances are obtained through the `addMethod()` methods of ClassBuilder and support both simple code-based method creation and advanced body building with mixed Java/JavaScript execution.
overview: The MethodBuilder provides a comprehensive and flexible API for creating methods that can range from simple getters/setters to complex mixed-language implementations with full annotation support and error handling capabilities.

methods.name: body
methods.description: Sets the method body using complete Java code.

methods.name: buildBody
methods.description: Creates a BodyBuilder for mixed Java/JavaScript method implementation.

methods.name: guestBody
methods.description: Sets the method body to execute JavaScript (Guest) code.

parameters.name: methodWrapper
parameters.description: JavaScript function to execute as method body

methods.name: addAnnotation
methods.description: Adds an annotation to the method.

methods.name: finish
methods.description: Finalizes the method and returns to the parent ClassBuilder.
